00044         protected override void OnRender(Graphics drawingContext)
00045         {
00046             if (this.Text != null)
00047             {
00048                 Size sizeContent = Size.Empty;
00049                 // Prepare font
00050                 Font font = new Font(this.fontFamily, this.fontSize, fontStyle);
00051                 // Measure the string
00052                 SizeF sizeContentF = drawingContext.MeasureString(this.Text, font);
00053                 sizeContent.Width = (int)sizeContentF.Width;
00054                 sizeContent.Height = (int)sizeContentF.Height;
00055                 // Calculate the location of the text
00056                 Point point = GetLocationFromContentAlignment(this.alignment, sizeContent);
00057                 // Draw the text
00058                 using (Brush brushText = new SolidBrush(this.Foreground))
00059                 {
00060                     Rectangle textRect = new Rectangle(point.X, point.Y, this.Width - 1, this.Height - 1);
00061                     drawingContext.DrawString(this.Text, font, brushText, textRect);
00062                 }
00063                 // Clean up
00064                 font.Dispose();
00065             }
00066         }
00067              
00068 
00069         private Point GetLocationFromContentAlignment(TextAlignment alignment, Size sizeContent)
00070         {
00071             Point point = new Point(this.Left, this.Top);
00072             byte offset = 2;
00073             
00074             // Horizontal Alignment
00075             if ((alignment & TextAlignment.Center) > 0)         // Center
00076             {
00077                 point.X = (this.Rectangle.Width / 2) - (sizeContent.Width / 2);
00078             }
00079             else if ((alignment & TextAlignment.Left) > 0)      // Left
00080             {
00081                 point.X = this.Rectangle.X + offset;
00082             }
00083             else if ((alignment & TextAlignment.Right) > 0)     // Right
00084             {
00085                 point.X = this.Rectangle.Width - sizeContent.Width - offset;
00086             }
00087 
00088             return point;
00089         }
